      • getAllSubThemesFor

        public static java.util.Collection getAllSubThemesFor(java.lang.Long parentThemeId)
                                               throws AimException
        Return all subchildren in the tree Recursively iterates on all child programs till the end of the branch.
        Parameters:
        parentThemeId - db ID of the parent program
        Returns:
        collection of AmpTheme beans
        Throws:
        AimException - if enything goes wrong

      • getAllSubThemesByParentId

        public static java.util.List getAllSubThemesByParentId(java.lang.Long parentThemeId,
                                                       int depth)
                                                throws AimException
        Returns all subchildren in the tree Recursively iterates on all children programs till the end of the branch. The names of children programs will be decorated with dashes. Use the method only for better presentation purpose
        Parameters:
        parentThemeId - db ID of the parent program
        depth - specified the level of program in hierarchy. e.i. 0 means first level program, 1 second level, etc. We use it to add "--" to the name of program for better presentation.
        Returns:
        collection of AmpTheme beans
        Throws:
        AimException - if anything goes wrong
        See Also:
        getAmpThemesAndSubThemes(AmpTheme parent), getAllSubThemesFor(Collection parentThemes)

      • getAllSubThemesByParentIdWihtChildren

        public static java.util.Collection getAllSubThemesByParentIdWihtChildren(java.lang.Long parentThemeId)
                                                                  throws AimException
        Returns all subchildren in the tree
        Parameters:
        parentThemeId - db ID of the parent program
        Returns:
        collection of AmpTheme beans
        Throws:
        AimException - if anything goes wrong
        See Also:
        getAmpThemesAndSubThemes(AmpTheme parent), getAllSubThemesFor(Collection parentThemes)

      • getAmpThemesAndSubThemes

        public static java.util.List<AmpTheme> getAmpThemesAndSubThemes(AmpTheme parent)
        Returns List of programs and sub-programs using getAllSubThemesByParentId(Long parentThemeId, int depth) method. The names of the programs are embellished (The main parent program will be in upper case and dashes will be added to children programs) for better presentation.
        Parameters:
        parent - parent program
        Returns:
        collection of AmpTheme beans

      • getAllSubThemesFor

        public static java.util.List getAllSubThemesFor(java.util.Collection parentThemes)
                                         throws AimException
        Return all subchildren of the parent program Recursively iterates on all child programs till the end of the branch using getAmpThemesAndSubThemes(AmpTheme parent) . The method is used for better presentation purpose only
        Parameters:
        parentThemes - collection of parent programs
        Returns:
        collection of AmpTheme beans
        Throws:
        AimException - if anything goes wrong

      • collectFilteringInformation

        public static void collectFilteringInformation(java.util.Collection<AmpTheme> userSelection,
                                               java.util.Collection<AmpTheme> activityFilterCol,
                                               java.util.Set<AmpTheme> columnDataCol)
        Parameters:
        userSelection - collection of AmpTheme objects corresponding to the filters selected by the user
        activityFilterCol - this collection will contain the selected objects and their descendants (this collection will be used to filter the activities)
        columnDataCol - this collection will contain the selected objects, their descendants and their ancestors (this collection will be used to filter out column data). One needs the information about ancestors in multi-level hierarchy reports otherwise the report engine won't know to which higher level hierarchy an activity belongs to.
        Throws:
        DgException

      • getRecursiveAscendantsOfPrograms

        Returns:
